articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on January 26 sent a congratulatory message to Joseph Kabila on his assumption of office as President of the Democratic Republic of Congo.
 He in the message sincerely wished the president great success in his responsible work for defending the sovereignty of the country and achieving its territorial integrity, convinced that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms in the future, too.

articles.content:
Credentials presented to Kim Yong Nam 
    Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Manuel Moto Tomo, new equatorial Guinean ambassador e.p. to Korea, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 After receiving the credentials, Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the ambassador.
